name: vk-pattern-directory-creator
description: Support Filtering Search of keyword, post-type and taxonomy.

scripts.start:first: npm install && composer install && wp-env start
scripts.update: npx ncu -u && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.phpunit: composer install && bash bin/install-theme.sh && wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/vk-pattern-directory-creator' vendor/bin/phpunit -c .phpunit.xml --verbose
